CustomField.formula: AND ( AND ( Clinical_Trial_Profile__r.Patient_Portal_Enabled__c=true, NOT (ISPICKVAL(Participant_Study_Enrollment__r.Status__c, "Trial Complete")), NOT (ISPICKVAL(Participant_Study_Enrollment__r.Status__c,"Drop out")) ), AND ( NOT (ISPICKVAL(Participant_Status__c, "Received")), NOT (ISPICKVAL(Participant_Status__c, "Unable to Reach")), NOT (ISPICKVAL(Participant_Status__c, "Eligibility Failed")), NOT (ISPICKVAL(Participant_Status__c, "Screening Failed")), NOT (ISPICKVAL(Participant_Status__c, "Enrollment Failed")), NOT (ISPICKVAL(Participant_Status__c, "Failed Review")), NOT (ISPICKVAL(Participant_Status__c, "Failed Referral")), NOT (ISPICKVAL(Participant_Status__c, "Excluded from Referring")) ), Not(IsNull(Screening_ID__c)) )
CustomField.label: IsRequestDataFromSDH
